Pre-Game Insights: The article provides a prediction for the MLB game between the Arizona Diamondbacks and Houston Astros on September 7, 2024.
The Diamondbacks have won eight of their last nine games against American League opponents that held a winning record.
The Astros have lost three of their last four games as favorites against National League opponents.
The Astros have failed to cover the run line in each of their last seven games as home favorites against the Diamondbacks following a home win.
The Diamondbacks have covered the run line in nine of their last 10 road games against the Astros following a road loss.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Nine of the Diamondbacks' last 10-day games against AL West opponents have gone UNDER the total runs line.
Three of the last four games between the Diamondbacks and Astros have gone UNDER the total runs line.
The 'Inning 1 UNDER 0.5 runs' market has hit in each of the Astros' last six games as home favorites against National League opponents.
The 'Inning 1 UNDER 0.5 runs' market has hit in each of the Diamondbacks' last three games as road underdogs against AL West opponents.
